about_the_game:
Mak Survival is a Survival game. In the game you play a human character who has a single goal, to survive and evolve the world of Oratius from wild creatures and monsters.

When you explore the map you can already see what the creatures have done to it. Some places the nature is fantastic but others are dead and deserted.

So what are you waiting for? Find your goal, if it is building a base, hunt in the woods or maybe help the local village?


Gather resources across the world, to help you with the crafting and building your base. We have diffrent tools to diffrent resources, like mining, woodcutting, fishing, dirt digging and more.

Explore the world and find diffrent location, where diffrent things i hidding. When you get higher level you can also build a Glider to help you explore and maybe when you have enough coins you can buy a horse, who knows. 

Mak Survival is a single/multiplayer survival game. In this game you can make diffrent worlds, where you together or alone can discover the world. In Mak Survival you can hunt animals, ride horses, build a glider to help you explore, evolve from a stone age to moderne age with metal bases and moderne weapons. Each world have its own secrets and history that you will learn when discovering. When you reache sertain levels you can also spawn companions that will help you to survive and for resource gathering. There is also a xp system, so you need to level up so you can craft new items. The heigher level you get, you will unlock more quests. Some of the quest are only for your self, but you can share some of them with other players, so you can help each other. There are also camps/villages, where you can trade with NPCs.

So Mak Survival have alot of diffrent things to structure the game. The most importing thing is that this game can by played as single player, co-op and to have your own dedicated server. So this helps people to enjoy the game and it also comes with a Admin Panel, so you can customize the game and adds alot of diffrent features like allowlist, spawn item/monsters, heal player and much much more.
